entry.title: Ukraine Urges Citizens to Flee Ahead of Expected Russian Assault in East
entry.content: Both sides are gearing up for a full-scale Russian attack in Donbas, with Kyiv trying to send in military supplies while Moscow repositions forces withdrawn from around Kyiv.

entry.title: China Accelerates Nuclear Buildup
entry.content: China has accelerated an expansion of its nuclear arsenal because of a change in its assessment of the threat posed by the U.S., people with knowledge of the Chinese leadership’s thinking say.

entry.title: Ukrainian Enclave in Brazil Offers Warm Welcome to War Refugees
entry.content: A tropical “Little Ukraine” is populated by descendants of Ukrainian immigrants who arrived decades ago and still maintain the old language and customs.
